title: This is very urgent must read. Rito pls.
body:
Id like to purchase an under the counter riot singed.

No questions asked.

;) ;)

As one of the like 15 singed mains in existence simply not having this skin is a constant living nightmare.

There are days i stare at its lolskinshop entry and just softly weep into my steelseries m800 keyboard. because all the codes are disabled.

I stare at the cheeky little shits orange gas and think to myself "if only you could be mine"

But alas it is not to be.

So yes this is a plea, a cry for help.

let phreak himself heed my call, and approve riot singed for jg.

Let the history books be rewritten, saint viscious was the one tasked with hunting down the rouge skin, and of course he missed his smite. I know its hiding in the shop somewhere.

its price steadily rising upwards of 10k rito pls points.

And its a price im willing to pay.

Hell ill slice off my dick and coat it in gold, so you can have your own gold member.

Or ill even sell you my pet rock.

I just need another hit of those singed skins man.

ive run out.

No more to buy.

I just need another hit man.

Or atleast a chroma pack, to sate my cravings, but as the great river demon himself kahm tench says.

No hunger is truly sated... or something like that.


I hope you take the time to read this, im going to go gas some juice now.
